name: Cute Carrot Game
description:
Prototyping out the idea for my Cute Carrot Game!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow me on Twitter

Buy me a Coffee?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GOAL: Protect your Baby Carrots from hungry insects & animals.

HOW: As a protective flying Carrot you obviously have a mean tackle attack.. just throw yourself at the enemies to do damage. 

TIP: Plant more Baby Carrots by right clicking (you can plant an additional 23 for now just because..)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LATEST UPDATE: (02/01/2020)

Caterpillars now transform if they manage to eat a whole Baby Carrot!

Their new forms are rock solid and can't be moved, they also regenerate health so don't leave them too long!

WORKING ON:

Boss Waves (can you guess what it'll be?!)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Left Click: Move

Right Click: Plant Baby Carrots

Press & Hold "Z" Key: Zoom Out

Press "Space Bar": Start a 'wave' of enemies

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Press "D" Key: some Debugging stuff

Press "R" Key: Restarts the Game
